creator: Technoskip
descriptionHtml:
Remote For Roku allows you to control your Roku like real remote.

Roku remote use will make your life easier. It will always be in the pocket and not break or lose.

This remote supports IR and Wi-Fi modes.


IR Remote Mode

- Simply install app and check remote by pressing any button.

- Launch the app and control your Roku directly.

- No additional hardware is required for Roku IR remote mode.

- IR Blaster must be present in your phone to use this remote mode.


Wi-Fi Remote Mode

- Roku and android phone must be connected to the same Wi-Fi network.

- Just Enter Roku IP address and control Roku.


Some of Primary Controllers

✔  Power On/Off

✔  Home

✔  Menu

✔  Back

✔  Info

✔  Options

✔  Instant Replay

✔  Volume Adjustments

✔  Menu Up/Down/Left/Right

✔  Ok

✔  Multimedia Buttons


Supported Roku Devices :

👉  Roku Streaming Stick

👉  Roku Express

👉  Roku Express+

👉  Roku Premiere

👉  Roku Premiere+

👉  Roku Ultra

👉  TCL Roku TV

👉  Hisense Roku TV

👉  Insignia Roku TV

👉  Sharp Roku TV

👉  Element Roku TV


We are not affiliated with Roku Corporation and this app is an Unofficial Product.
descriptionShort: Control Roku Devices From Android Phones

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Operate Roku devices from mobile phones

title: Remote For Roku

creator: Technoskip
descriptionHtml:
Roku remote application is specially designed specifically to control Roku. Simple design, intuitive interface and simple buttons. Simply point remote to Roku and use remote by pressing any button. IR Blaster must be present in your phone to use this remote.

The app features all the necessary buttons. You no longer have to look for your Roku remote control or buy a new one in order to replace the one broken down.

Key Features:
- Fully functional remote control
- Vibration on remote button
- Both IR and Wi-Fi supported

Compatible Devices:
- Roku Streaming Stick
- Roku Express
- Roku Express+
- Roku Premiere
- Roku Premiere+
- Roku Ultra

Disclaimer:
“Remote for Roku” app is not an official Roku application. We are not affiliated with Roku Inc. any way.
